name: Space Quest 4+5+6
description:
Experience a blast from the past with three games from the Space Quest series. As Roger Wilco, a heroic janitor, you're up against screwy space aliens with the fate of the universe in your dishpan hands. Travel with him to exotic worlds, meet strange life forms and laugh yourself silly as you journey through hours of hilarious adventure.

But be aware that dangerous, knee-slapping jokes can be found in every corner of the galaxy!Includes Space Quest IV: Roger Wilco and the Time Rippers, Space Quest V: The Next Mutation, Space Quest 6: Roger Wilco in The Spinal Frontier The funniest sci-fi-themed adventure game series ever created Mop the space ship, scrub the plasma conduits and save the universe!
